name: Amulet of Hidden Light
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/New Racial Rules/Fetchling Magic Items/Amulet of Hidden Light

sections.body: This large amulet crafted of rough-cut glass can, on command, shed light as a sunrod. Unlike a normal light source, creatures outside this area cannot see the amulet's light.
sections.name: Description
